text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Very well, I'll leap at the chance to run!
And so, Narita Brian becomes the newest member of Team Sirius.
I'll soon get to see exactly how boundless her talent really is.

After joining the team, Narita Brian doesn't just maintain her 
performance levels—she exceeds them.

With the Satsuki Sho won, next will be the Twinkle Series' most 
celebrated race, the Tokyo Yushun, Japanese Derby.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
After your last race, some are predicting you'll be a Triple Crown 
champion! Are you confident you can become the fifth ever to do it?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I didn't even get the second crown in the Japanese Derby yet. Why 
would I be confident about anything?

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
Racers who didn't participate in the Satsuki Sho will be running in the 
Japanese Derby. What's your strategy against these newcomers?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Strategy? Hmph… All I need to do is get to the finish line first.

text_block_list.name: Reporter C
text_block_list.text: Ms. Brian, please, over here!

text_block_list.name: Reporter D
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Me first, Ms. Brian!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Just look at the number of journalists.
choice_data_list: Everyone's got their eyes on her right now.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She's in the middle of a five-win streak, with two of them being G1 
races. That momentum has taken her straight to the Japanese Derby.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm sure she'll be favored to win the race…

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: Something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
High expectations mean one misstep could do immense damage, like 
what happened to me once.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
How will she face the pressure of being the favorite in such an 
important race? It'll be a moment of truth for her.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Let me do one more sprint on the ramp!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Good idea—go for it!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
The Japanese Derby is 2,400 meters. We've gotta set that pace into 
your muscle memory!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: All right, understood!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The mood on the training course has been so tense lately…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, well it's the Derby! Everybody's desperate for this 
once-in-a-lifetime chance.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: That's not all. Heaps of peeps have been watching Narita Brian train!
They're all devising ways to beat her.

Her rivals are persistent, and they've all marked Brian as their target. 
Winning the Derby's not going to be easy.
Which makes that all the more important…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer, aren't you gonna get the call soon?
Right, I'll go check. Everyone keep training.
Right, I'll go check. Everyone keep training.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, what's this about a call?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
They say only the luckiest racer wins the Derby, right? Well, we're 
about to find out whether Brian's got the luck.

Brian's good at keeping up with the lead pack in a race. So it'll be 
important to get into a good position while conserving her stamina as 
much as possible.
And the key to that is having the right starting gate.
No way…
No way…

Post eight-seventeen… The farthest from the inside rail, with the most 
ground to cover. Luck isn't on Brian's side.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: It's the big day of the Tokyo Yushun, Japanese Derby!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Will the standout favorite Narita Brian take the win? Or will it be one 
of her many rivals who've pushed so far to make it here?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
You're in perfect shape! Believe in yourself and run with all you've 
got!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Okay! When I'm out there, I'll remember all the training I did!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
A good start is key! Take all the advantage that inside post has to 
give!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much for training me! I'll definitely bring you back first 
place!

The stands might be roaring with excitement, but the air back here is 
tense.

The stands might be roaring with excitement, but the air back here is 
tense.

You know the Derby's special. Every racer's trained their heart out to 
get the glory here.

You know the Derby's special. Every racer's trained their heart out to 
get the glory here.

And they've been prepped to go up against you specifically. Plus 
you're in the worst starting gate.

And they've been prepped to go up against you specifically. Plus 
you're in the worst starting gate.
Obviously, winning this is going to be a challenge, so…
Obviously, winning this is going to be a challenge, so…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: So what?
Huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't need to worry about any of that. All I need to do is rip through 
the pack and win.
Ready or not, the Derby gates open, and I'm reminded once again…

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're at the last turn, and Narita Brian's sweeping in from far 
outside! Just like that, she's taken the lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: She blasts ahead—that's it! Brian wins it!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian has her second crown! With an unbelievable five-length 
lead, the Satsuki Sho winner has claimed another amazing victory!
Cheers!
choice_data_list:
No matter the opponent, no matter their 
strategy, no matter the odds, she still wins!
Hey, rockstar! You tore up the competition!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwaaagh! That was better than anyone could hope for! Another Derby legend is born TODAAAY!

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: She always does the unexpected!

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: She always does the unexpected!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I don't care how other people see me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I've said it before—the Derby, the Triple Crown… They're all just 
stepping stones.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Um, hey, didn't she just run 2,400 meters? Does she breathe like the 
rest of us?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Now that you mention it…
